info.title: SLERP Core API
info.description: An API that houses ERP data, allowing open development around institutional data.

post.description: Verify the ownership of an external resource such as an email address or mobile phone. This is done by posting the verification token to the API.

parameters.name: token
parameters.description: The unique token sent to the external resource.

get.summary: Verify Email or Mobile Phone.
get.description: Verify the ownership of an external resource such as an email address or mobile phone. This is done by sending the verification token in the url with a GET request.

parameters.name: token
parameters.description: The unique token sent to the external resource.

post.description: Authenticate with the API by sending your API Secret and receive a JWT in response.

parameters.name: secret
parameters.description: The API consumers secret token.

X-RateLimit-Limit.description: The number of allowed requests in the current period

X-RateLimit-Remaining.description: The number of remaining requests in the current period

X-RateLimit-Reset.description: The number of seconds left in the current period

token.description:
Login

Endpoint for secret token to be posted. Returns a JWT.

post.description: Authenticate with the API by sending your credentials and receive a JWT in response.

parameters.name: email
parameters.description: The API consumers email address.

parameters.name: password
parameters.description: The API consumers password.

X-RateLimit-Limit.description: The number of allowed requests in the current period

X-RateLimit-Remaining.description: The number of remaining requests in the current period

X-RateLimit-Reset.description: The number of seconds left in the current period

token.description:
Login

Endpoint for credentials to be posted. Returns a JWT.

get.summary: Verify authenticated session.
get.description: Verifies the JWT token.

X-RateLimit-Limit.description: The number of allowed requests in the current period

X-RateLimit-Remaining.description: The number of remaining requests in the current period

X-RateLimit-Reset.description: The number of seconds left in the current period

post.description: Store account information. Creates, updates, restores, an account based on it's current status

parameters.name: identifier
parameters.description: Unique identifier for account.

parameters.name: username
parameters.description: Unqiue username for account.

parameters.name: name_prefix
parameters.description: Optional name pefix.

parameters.name: name_first
parameters.description: The first name of the account owner.

parameters.name: name_middle
parameters.description: The middle name of the account owner.

parameters.name: name_last
parameters.description: The last name of the account owner.

parameters.name: name_postifx
parameters.description: Optional name postfix.

parameters.name: name_phonetic
parameters.description: Optional phonetic name.

parameters.name: primary_duty_id
parameters.description: The primary duty ID for this account. This is required without `primary_duty_code`.

parameters.name: primary_duty_code
parameters.description: The primary duty Code for this account. This is required without `primary_duty_id`.

parameters.name: ssn
parameters.description: The last four digits of the account owner's social security number. This is only availble to API consumers who have classified permissions.

parameters.name: password
parameters.description: The inital password assigned to this account when it is created. This is only availble to API consumers who have classified permissions.

parameters.name: should_propagate_password
parameters.description: If this is set to true and a `password` paramater is supplied third party integrations such as Active Directory will use this password for the account within their systems.

parameters.name: birth_date
parameters.description: The acount owner's birth date in string format`(yyyy-mm-dd)`. This is only availble to API consumers who have classified permissions.

201.description: Account Created. The account information has been stored and the account was either created, updated, or restored based on the information that was provided.

location.description: A URL to the new object.

X-RateLimit-Limit.description: The number of allowed requests in the current period

X-RateLimit-Remaining.description: The number of remaining requests in the current period

X-RateLimit-Reset.description: The number of seconds left in the current period

X-RateLimit-Limit.description: The number of allowed requests in the current period

X-RateLimit-Remaining.description: The number of remaining requests in the current period

X-RateLimit-Reset.description: The number of seconds left in the current period

post.description: Assigns a duty to the specified account based on the `duty_id` or `code`, one of those must be supplied. At least one of the following account attributes must be supplied; `identifer`, `account_id`, or `username`.

parameters.name: account_id
parameters.description: Unique primary key for account.

parameters.name: identifier
parameters.description: Unique identifier for account.

parameters.name: username
parameters.description: Unique username for account.

parameters.name: duty_id
parameters.description: The duties' primary key id. This is required without a `code`.

parameters.name: code
parameters.description: The duties' unique code. This is required without a `duty_id`.

delete.description: Detaches a duty from the specified account based on the `duty_id` or `code`, one of those must be supplied. At least one of the following account attributes must be supplied; `identifer`, `account_id`, or `username`.

parameters.name: account_id
parameters.description: Unique primary key for account.

parameters.name: identifier
parameters.description: Unique identifier for account.

parameters.name: username
parameters.description: Unique username for account.

parameters.name: duty_id
parameters.description: The duties' primary key id. This is required without a `code`.

parameters.name: code
parameters.description: The duties' unique code. This is required without a `duty_id`.

parameters.name: code

get.summary: List Addresses in a paginated format.
get.description: Return a paginated list of addresses.

X-RateLimit-Limit.description: The number of allowed requests in the current period

X-RateLimit-Remaining.description: The number of remaining requests in the current period

X-RateLimit-Reset.description: The number of seconds left in the current period

post.description: Stores an address. When storing an address you may supply any uniquely identifying information pretaining to an account (`account_id`, `identifier`, or `username`), but at least one of those parameters needs to be supplied.

parameters.name: account_id
parameters.description: Unique primary key of address owner. This is required without the `identifier` or `username` parameters.

parameters.name: identifier
parameters.description: Unique identifier string of the address owner. This is required without the `account_id` or `username` parameters.

parameters.name: username
parameters.description: Unique username string of the address owner. This is required without the `account_id` or `identifier` parameters.

parameters.name: addressee
parameters.description: The name of the person to address at this address.

parameters.name: organization
parameters.description: The organization located at this address if any.

parameters.name: line_1
parameters.description: The first line in the address.

parameters.name: line_2
parameters.description: The second line in the address, if any.

parameters.name: city
parameters.description: The city that this address is located in.

parameters.name: state_id
parameters.description: The primary key of the state that this address resides in. This is required without the `state_code` parameter.

parameters.name: state_code
parameters.description: The unique code of the state that this address resides in. This is required without the `state_id` parameter.

parameters.name: zip
parameters.description: The zip code that this address resides in.

parameters.name: country_id
parameters.description: The primary key of the country that this address resides in. This is required without the `country_code` parameter.

parameters.name: country_code
parameters.description: The unique code of the country that this address resides in. This is required without the `country_id` parameter.

parameters.name: latitude
parameters.description: A latitude value related to this addres.

parameters.name: longitude
parameters.description: A longitude value related to this addres.

201.description: Address Created. The address information has been stored.

location.description: A URL to the new object.

X-RateLimit-Limit.description: The number of allowed requests in the current period

X-RateLimit-Remaining.description: The number of remaining requests in the current period

X-RateLimit-Reset.description: The number of seconds left in the current period

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Unique primary key for address.

get.summary: Show an Address by ID.
get.description: Retrieve a specific address based on it's primary key id value.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Unique primary key for address.

X-RateLimit-Limit.description: The number of allowed requests in the current period

X-RateLimit-Remaining.description: The number of remaining requests in the current period

X-RateLimit-Reset.description: The number of seconds left in the current period

parameters.description: The academic level of this course.

parameters.name: department_id
parameters.description: The id of the parent department. This is required without the `department_code` attribute.

parameters.description: The unique code of the parent department. This is required without the `department_id` attribute.

201.description: Course Created. The course information has been stored and the course was either created, updated, or restored based on the information that was provided.

post.description: Store email information. Creates, updates, restores, a email based on it's current status.

parameters.name: account_id
parameters.description: Unique primary key of email owner. This is required without the `identifier` or `username` parameters.

parameters.name: identifier
parameters.description: Unique identifier string of the email owner. This is required without the `account_id` or `username` parameters.

parameters.name: username
parameters.description: Unique username string of the email owner. This is required without the `account_id` or `identifier` parameters.

parameters.name: address
parameters.description: The email address for this email object.

parameters.name: verified
parameters.description: Determines if this email has been verified. By default it assumes the email has not been verified.

201.description: Email Created. The email information has been stored and the email was either created, updated, or restored based on the information that was provided.

location.description: A URL to the new object.

X-RateLimit-Limit.description: The number of allowed requests in the current period

X-RateLimit-Remaining.description: The number of remaining requests in the current period

X-RateLimit-Reset.description: The number of seconds left in the current period

delete.description: Delete a email based on `id` or `address`. At least one of those parameters must be supplied.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Unique primary key for email. This is required without the `address` parameter.

parameters.name: address
parameters.description: The email address to delete. This is required without the `id` parameter.

get.summary: Show an Email by ID.
get.description: Retrieve a specific email based on it's primary key id value.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Unique primary key for the email.

X-RateLimit-Limit.description: The number of allowed requests in the current period

X-RateLimit-Reset.description: The number of seconds left in the current period

parameters.name: account_id

parameters.description: Unique identifier string of the mobile phone owner. This is required without the `account_id` or `username` parameters.

parameters.name: username
parameters.description: Unique username string of the mobile phone owner. This is required without the `account_id` or `identifier` parameters.

parameters.name: number
parameters.description: The mobile phone number for this mobile phone object.

parameters.name: country_code
parameters.description: The mobile phone country code for this mobile phone object.

parameters.description: The mobile caerier ID that this phone belongs to. This is required without the `mobile_carrier_code` parameter.

parameters.name: mobile_carrier_code
parameters.description: The mobile caerier Code that this phone belongs to. This is required without the `mobile_carrier_id` parameter.

parameters.name: verified
parameters.description: Determines if this mobile phone has been verified. By default it assumes the mobile phone has not been verified.
